plot: Shortly after discovering a box buried in his backyard, Ryan Telnifer is pulled into a strange circle of events that threatens his life. His only ally is a mysterious stranger on the Internet who uses the screen name "very_little_time."
title: Very Little Time
plot_es: Shortly after discovering a box buried in his backyard, Ryan Telnifer is pulled into a strange circle of events that threatens his life. His only ally is a mysterious stranger on the Internet who uses the screen name "very_little_time."
plot_en: Shortly after discovering a box buried in his backyard, Ryan Telnifer is pulled into a strange circle of events that threatens his life. His only ally is a mysterious stranger on the Internet who uses the screen name "very_little_time."
